translated: The Ritual Procedures for Reciting and Making Offerings to the Sutra of the Seven Buddhas' Vows and Merits of the Medicine Master Lapis Lazuli Light King
Translated by the Great Yuan Tripiá¹­aka Åšramaá¹‡a Åšarabha in Response to the Imperial EdictğŸ”½This ground of mine, all around,
Is free from the defilements of tiles, pebbles, sand, and so forth.ğŸ”½It is level like the palm of the hand and supremely excellent,
And becomes a pure ground of lapis lazuli.ğŸ”½The adornments are like the Land of Ultimate Bliss,
With various treasures interspersed and flowers covering everywhere.ğŸ”½There are all the jeweled trees and jeweled ponds,
And they all emit the subtle and wonderful great Dharma sounds.ğŸ”½Born from the supramundane roots of goodness,
It is accomplished with various wondrous treasures.ğŸ”½And it is endowed with immeasurable great light,
May the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas peacefully abide here.ğŸ”½The body originally has no coming or going, increase or decrease,
Because of the perfect and subtle supreme vow,ğŸ”½It is like the birth of the white light,
Desiring to descend to save the world.ğŸ”½The pure, vast, and wondrous jeweled seat,
The body is free from all obstructions,
Relying on the nature of equality, always abiding in the seat of great peace and comfort, please accept.
The nature of the pure dharma realm is immovable, great compassion observes all sentient beings.
The perfect great enlightenment and all wonderful practices, the guide of the three times, please descend.
For the sake of the suffering sentient beings, manifest the descent into the muddy world.
Not tainted by the dust of the three existences, arouse the vows to abide in the lotus seat.
The guide has already ascended the lotus seat, the honored one who rescues the three realms.
The three of body, speech, and mind all bestow empowerment, please empower us.
Thus abiding in the nature of great bliss and light, out of compassion for us sentient beings.
The clouds of compassion spread throughout the ten directions, please rain down the treasures of siddhi.
In the east, in the world of AsamÄ, the Buddha SubhÅ«ti with immeasurable assemblies.
Far from afflictions, fulfilling vows, for the sake of the holy benefactors, please descend.
In the east, in the country of Wonderful Jewel Adornment, the assembly of immeasurable multitudes of Jewel Moon and Wisdom Adornment,
In order to eliminate distraction and disputes, for the sake of the holy benefactors, please come down.
In the east, in the country of Accumulated Jewels of Fulfilment, the assembly of immeasurable multitudes of golden-colored jewel light,
Extending life and receiving predictions at the time of death, for the sake of the holy benefactors, please come down.
In the east, in the world of no worries, the immeasurable multitudes of the most victorious one without worries,
Eliminating all suffering and afflictions, for the sake of the holy benefactors, please come down.
In the east, in the world of Dharma Banner, the immeasurable multitudes of Dharma Ocean Thunder Sound,
Eliminating wrong views and obstacles, for the sake of the holy benefactors, please come down.
In the east, in the country of Well-Abiding Jewel Ocean, the immeasurable multitudes of Dharma Ocean Supreme Wisdom,
Perfectly fulfilling the pure land samadhi, for the sake of the holy benefactors, please come down.
In the east, in the pure lapis lazuli realm, the assembly of the sun, moon, and universal illumination of the Medicine Master,
For the sake of the noble benefactors, please come.ğŸ”½The unsurpassed sage, the one who has gone to bliss, the assembly,
The immeasurable merits, the powers of all Buddhas,ğŸ”½Not abandoning the supreme and wonderful practices and vows,
For the sake of the noble benefactors, please come.ğŸ”½The one who cuts off afflictions and karma with the sword of sutras,
The one with mastery over speech and who lights the torch of Dharma,ğŸ”½The one who perfects our sutra merits,
Therefore, the noble assembly, please come.ğŸ”½If one takes refuge, they will be freed from illness and suffering,
And accomplish the unsurpassed sage's vows.ğŸ”½Purifying the intense suffering at the end of life,
For the sake of benefiting us, please come.ğŸ”½Overcoming sensual desires and attaining mastery,
The great Brahma, Indra, and Dharma protectors,ğŸ”½The assembly of upasakas and others who invite,
For the sake of benefiting sentient beings, please come.ğŸ”½The secret and autonomous mind-born sons,
Taming the good and evil aspects of hatred and love,ğŸ”½The one who perfects the seven Buddhas' supreme vows,
The one with great spiritual powers, please come.
The merit of the divine power of protection is rare. For the sake of sentient beings, please come down.
The general Kubera invites the assembly. For the sake of sentient beings, please come down.
The eight tathÄgatas of great compassion do not go against their original vows. With loving thoughts for sentient beings,
I now sincerely set up this altar. Together with the great assembly, I wish for you to come down.
All the sugatas, bhagavats, with great compassion, please take pity on us.
We also possess a share of blessings and virtues. We only wish for you to please remain on this jeweled seat.
The World-Honored One's spiritual powers and majestic virtue, out of compassion for us sentient beings,
The World-Honored One's great kindness wishes to come down. We only wish for you to please remain on this seat.
We offer you this place of worship. We only wish for you to peacefully abide in this place of practice.
Please accept the offerings such as the argha water, and also fulfill our wishes.
Just as when the TathÄgata was born, all the devas performed ablutions,
I use this pure and wondrous heavenly water to bathe you in the same way.
True wisdom is by nature originally pure, without the afflictions of grasping and clinging.
In order to purify the sentient beings' tainted habits, I wash the hands and feet of the holy assembly.
Sentient beings who are exhausted and thirsty from afflictions, I satisfy them with the cool water of the Dharma.
Purifying our tainted defilements, I offer this water in a vase, please accept it.
Lions, elephant kings, fine horses, vajras, maá¹‡is, sun and moon discs,
Stainless, pure lotus seats - I wish to abide in the nature of non-abiding.
The self-nature of all dharmas is originally pure, without the characteristics of any tainted defilements.
In accordance with the worldly practice of respect, those who abide in the lotus seat of non-attachment
Do not enter parinirvÄá¹‡a, as the nature of great compassion does not abandon afflictions without being tainted.
The self-nature is originally pure without attachment, I request you to abide in the pure lotus seat.
The poison of afflictions oppresses sentient beings, but the sweet dew of great compassion can purify them.
Because of the perfect and subtle supreme vows, I bow my head in reverence to the assembly of the Well-Gone Ones.
Because of being oppressed by afflictions, karma, and suffering, one observes sentient beings and gives rise to great compassion.
In order to eliminate afflictions, one makes vast vows. I pay homage to the assembly of the seven buddhas.
Endowed with various precious merits, the pure wisdom body is adorned with wonderful characteristics.
The golden-colored body is worshipped by humans and gods. I bow my head to the TathÄgata, the god among gods.
The nature of the pure dharma realm is tranquil, and the manifested body pervades the realms of the ten directions.
The TathÄgata, who is like a maá¹‡i jewel king, I pay homage by making offerings and praises.
The precious merits of the unsurpassed Three Jewels are inconceivable when respectfully believed in and blessings are obtained.
The honored one among all sentient beings is able to save. I pay homage to the Three Jewels that should be worshipped.
The World-Honored One, with the wonderful adornments of great kindness, is the honored one of right and universal knowledge, the great guide.
Able to bestow the ocean of blessings and wisdom, I praise and pay homage to the TathÄgatas.
Pure by nature, free from all desires, able to liberate from all evil destinies,
The profound and wondrous principle of one taste, the marvelous Dharma of tranquility, I praise.
Realizing the path of liberation, demonstrating liberation, upholding the precepts, worthy of respect,
Giving rise to the supreme field of merit, the honored one among the assemblies, I praise.
Those who delight in the extensive can also praise the Three Jewels extensively as in the separate text.
The adornments possessed by the Buddha's body, the supreme adornment of the major and minor marks of a great being,
In order to remove defilements and fulfill wishes, therefore I offer this maá¹‡á¸ala.

I offer to the assembly of the ocean of Sugatas, for the sake of sentient beings, may they accept it.

I offer to the assembly of Sugatas, for the sake of sentient beings, may they accept.

In front of the ocean assembly of the Seven Buddhas and Tathagatas, I now offer this great jeweled wheel
Cutting off the suffering of samsara in the three existences, may they turn the unsurpassed wonderful Dharma wheel.
In front of the ocean assembly of the Seven Buddhas and Tathagatas, I now offer this maá¹‡i jewel
Cutting off the suffering of poverty and destitution, may they enjoy abundant resources.
In front of the ocean assembly of the Seven Buddhas and Tathagatas, I now offer this precious beautiful woman
Eradicating the darkness of ignorance, I vow to realize the mother of prajna, the Buddha's enlightenment.
In the presence of the ocean-like assembly of the Seven Buddhas, I now offer the treasure of ministers.
Comprehending the subtle wisdom of the Three Vehicles, ultimately perfecting all merits and virtues,
In the presence of the ocean-like assembly of the Seven Buddhas, I now offer the treasure of fine horses.
Escaping the three realms and attaining spiritual powers, I vow to quickly go to all buddha-lands.
In the presence of the ocean-like assembly of the Seven Buddhas, I now offer the treasure of great elephants.
Cutting off evil views and relying on the Mahayana, I vow to quickly go to the city of liberation and omniscience.
In the presence of the ocean-like assembly of the Seven Buddhas, I now offer the treasure of generals.
Subduing the enemies of afflictions, I vow to realize the supreme principle of freedom from arrogance.
All the evil karma I have created in the past is due to beginningless greed, anger, and delusion,
Arising from body, speech, and mind, I now repent of it all.
All sentient beings in the ten directions, learners and post-learners of the two vehicles,
All the merits of the TathÄgatas and Bodhisattvas, I rejoice in them all.

I only wish that the assembly of the eight great TathÄgatas will quickly enable accomplishment and bestow acceptance.
The pure and beautiful opening of the wonderful marks and characteristics, the adornment of the body with the fruits of the minor marks,
Seeing, hearing, remembering, and attaining auspiciousness, I praise and pay homage to the Buddha of Good Renown.
Your body is adorned with the major and minor marks of a great person, and you possess a mind of great, rare compassion.
Your perfect voice pervades the worlds of dust and sand. I make offerings to Buddha Good Renown.

The Guide always acts as a refuge, benefiting all sentient beings.
Accomplishing all blissful matters, may auspiciousness always be at peace.
Adorned with the wondrous adornments of the precious moon and lotus, you have thoroughly realized all knowable dharmas.

Your pure body of wondrous jewels, like the moonlight, removes suffering and distress.
Like a lotus, you are unstained and attached, I make offerings to your most wondrous and majestic body.

I present it to the Tathagata Raing-Sounding King, please accept it for the benefit of sentient beings.

For my ignorance and lack of understanding, I have deviated from the wholesome deeds I cultivated.
